What it is: A ritual prompt that stabilizes your core self when in psychological drift.
How to use it: Describe your current uncertainty. Ask AI to generate a symbolic anchor phrase and artifact.
What it changes: Restores internal solidity and narrative cohesion.

What it is: Models your personal transformation journey as a symbolic death-rebirth arc.
How to use it: Describe a recent upheaval. Ask AI to map the phases of symbolic death and resurrection.
What it changes: Provides archetypal structure for personal change.

What it is: Defines your symbolic energetic fingerprint using metaphor.
How to use it: Ask AI: ‘If I were a natural phenomenon or mythical force, what would I be and why?’

What it is: Externalizes anxiety into symbolic image for reinterpretation.
How to use it: Describe your anxiety physically. Ask AI to represent it as a symbolic entity and suggest a response.

What it is: Reframes life crises as symbolic rites of passage.
How to use it: Describe a disruptive event. Ask AI to identify how it functions as symbolic initiation.

What it is: Uncovers what you are symbolically refusing to see.
How to use it: Describe recurring issues. Ask AI: ‘What symbolic truths am I trained to ignore?’
What it changes: Surfaces hidden insight locked behind avoidance.

What it is: Detects where your subconscious blocks what your conscious mind desires.
How to use it: Describe a desire you keep delaying. Ask AI why your subconscious doesn’t trust it yet.
What it changes: Aligns inner factions for integrated action.

What it is: Symbolically integrates the part of you that self-sabotages.
How to use it: Describe how you block your own progress. Ask AI to embody that part and create an alliance ritual.

What it is: Encodes your current values and fears into a symbolic container to revisit later.
How to use it: Describe your present moment. Ask AI to create a metaphorical container and record.

What it is: Substitutes maladaptive behaviors with symbolic rituals.
How to use it: Describe a habit you want to stop. Ask AI to design a symbolic action that satisfies the same urge.
What it changes: Redirects behavior into meaningful symbolic fulfillment.
